languages.text: {n}Пристыженные гвардейцы отводят взгляды от вас — {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}великого полководца Астра Милитарум{/d}, подчиняться которо{mf|му|й} для любого рядового так же естественно, как дышать.{/n}

{n}Shamed by your words, the Guardsmen avert their eyes from you, a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}great Astra Militarum commander{/d}, obeying whose orders comes as naturally as breathing to any private.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Пристыженные гвардейцы отводят взгляды от вас — {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}великого полководца Астра Милитарум{/d}, подчиняться которо{mf|му|й} для любого рядового так же естественно, как дышать.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Von deinen Worten beschämt, wenden die Soldaten den Blick von dir ab, einem {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}großen Commander des Astra Militarum{/d}, bei dem für jeden Rekruten das Befolgen von Befehlen so natürlich ist wie das Atmen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Shamed by your words, the Guardsmen avert their eyes from you, a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}great Astra Militarum commander{/d}, obeying whose orders comes as naturally as breathing to any private.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Von deinen Worten beschämt, wenden die Soldaten den Blick von dir ab, einem {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}großen Commander des Astra Militarum{/d}, bei dem für jeden Rekruten das Befolgen von Befehlen so natürlich ist wie das Atmen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Honteux, les gardes baissent les yeux devant vous, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}{mf|un grand commandant de l'Astra Militarum|une grande commandante de l'Astra Militarum}{/d}. Obéir à quelqu'un de votre trempe est tout naturel pour eux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Shamed by your words, the Guardsmen avert their eyes from you, a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}great Astra Militarum commander{/d}, obeying whose orders comes as naturally as breathing to any private.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Honteux, les gardes baissent les yeux devant vous, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}{mf|un grand commandant de l'Astra Militarum|une grande commandante de l'Astra Militarum{/d}. Obéir à quelqu'un de votre trempe est tout naturel pour eux.{/n}

languages.text: {n}听了你的话，众多帝国卫队士兵感到羞愧不已，从你身上移开了视线。你是一位{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}伟大的星界军指挥官{/d}，对所有士兵而言，服从你的命令就像呼吸一样自然。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Shamed by your words, the Guardsmen avert their eyes from you, a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}great Astra Militarum commander{/d}, obeying whose orders comes as naturally as breathing to any private.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}听了你的话，众多帝国卫队士兵感到羞愧不已，从你身上移开了视线。你是一位{/d}伟大的星界军指挥官{/n}，对所有士兵而言，服从你的命令就像呼吸一样自然。{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}

languages.text: {n}Avergonzados por tus palabras, los guardias apartan la mirada de un{mf||a} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}gran comandante del Astra Militarum{/d}, cuyas órdenes son tan naturales como respirar para cualquier soldado raso.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Shamed by your words, the Guardsmen avert their eyes from you, a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}great Astra Militarum commander{/d}, obeying whose orders comes as naturally as breathing to any private.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Avergonzados por tus palabras, los guardias apartan la mirada de un{mf||a} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}gran comandante del Astra Militarum{/d}, cuyas órdenes son tan naturales como respirar para cualquier soldado raso.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの言葉に恥じ入ったガーズマンたちは、{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}偉大な帝国防衛軍司令官{/d}であるあなたから目を逸らす。どんな兵卒にとっても、あなたの命令に従うことは、呼吸するのと同じくらい自然なことなのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Shamed by your words, the Guardsmen avert their eyes from you, a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}great Astra Militarum commander{/d}, obeying whose orders comes as naturally as breathing to any private.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの言葉に恥じ入ったガーズマンたちは、{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}偉大な帝国防衛軍司令官{/d}であるあなたから目を逸らす。どんな兵卒にとっても、あなたの命令に従うことは、呼吸するのと同じくらい自然なことなのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Söylediklerin üzerine utanan Muhafızlar, gözlerini senden kaçırıyor. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}Astra Militarum'un büyük bir komutanı{/d} olarak verdiğin emirlere itaat etmek, her erin doğasında var gibi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Shamed by your words, the Guardsmen avert their eyes from you, a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}great Astra Militarum commander{/d}, obeying whose orders comes as naturally as breathing to any private.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Söylediklerin üzerine utanan Muhafızlar gözlerini senden kaçırıyor. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Militarum}Astra Militarum'un büyük bir komutanı{/d} olarak, verdiğin emirlere itaat etmek, her erin doğasında var gibi.{/n}
